1.0.name: wordpress/blogger-blogspot-redirect
1.0.description:
Based on a meta refresh tag on blogspot this plugin will redirect blogger permalinks to the correct wordpress post. Requires Blogger Redirector by Sam Wong (http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/blogger-redirector/).

Why this in addition to the Blogger Redirector plugin?

Because Blogger changed the redirect for a custom domain and no longer returns a proper 301-redirect. Thus the only way now to redirect both visitors and search engines crawlers is to use a META refresh in blogspot.
